newsitem.title: UK: UK Treasury sees order books filling, prices down.
newsitem.headline: UK Treasury sees order books filling, prices down.

text.p: The British Treasury said purchasing manager data on Thursday showed manufacturing order books were filling up but prices to factories were declining.
"Today's survey shows order books in manufacturing filling up and prices into the factory falling," a Treasury official said.

The December purchasing managers' index (PMI) fell to a sesaonally adjusted 52.5 percent from a downward revised 54.2 in November. The figure indicated an expansion in manufacturing for the seventh successive month.
